verses.verse: And it shall come to pass <S%H8085><s%>, if you shall listen diligently <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> you on high <S%H5945><s%> above all nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>:

And all these blessings <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you <S%H5381><s%>, and overtake you <S%H8085><s%>, if you shall listen unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be in the field <S%H7704><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle <S%H929><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows <S%H504><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep <S%H6629><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your store <S%H4863><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be when you come in <S%H935><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be when you go out <S%H3318><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against you to be struck <S%H5062><s%> before your face <S%H6440><s%>: they shall come out <S%H3318><s%> against you one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall command <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon you in your storehouses <S%H618><s%>, and in all that you set <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H1288><s%>; and he shall bless you in the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you <S%H5414><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall establish <S%H6965><s%> you an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself <S%H7650><s%>, as he has sworn unto you <S%H8104><s%>, if you shall keep the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>.

And all people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that you are called <S%H7121><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and they shall be afraid of you <S%H3372><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall make you plentiful <S%H3498><s%> in goods <S%H2896><s%>, in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle <S%H929><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give you <S%H5414><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall open <S%H6605><s%> unto you his good <S%H2896><s%> treasure <S%H214><s%>, the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> unto your land <S%H776><s%> in his season <S%H6256><s%>, and to bless <S%H1288><s%> all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>: and you shall lend <S%H3867><s%> unto many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, and you shall not borrow <S%H3867><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> you the head <S%H7218><s%>, and not the tail <S%H2180><s%>; and you shall be above only <S%H4605><s%>, and you shall not be beneath <S%H4295><s%>; if that you listen <S%H8085><s%> unto the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do them <S%H6213><s%>:

And you shall not go aside <S%H5493><s%> from any of the words <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to the right hand <S%H3225><s%>, or to the left <S%H8040><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve them <S%H5647><s%>.

But it shall come to pass <S%H8085><s%>, if you will not listen unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>; that all these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon you <S%H5381><s%>, and overtake you:
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be in the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your store <S%H4863><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows <S%H504><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep <S%H6629><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be when you come in <S%H935><s%>, and cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be when you go out <S%H3318><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> upon you cursing <S%H3994><s%>, vexation <S%H4103><s%>, and rebuke <S%H4045><s%>, in all that you set <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> unto for to do <S%H6213><s%>, until you be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>, and until you perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%>; because <S%H6440><s%> of the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of your doings <S%H4611><s%>, by which you have forsaken me <S%H5800><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall make the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto you <S%H3615><s%>, until he have consumed you from off the land <S%H127><s%>, where you go <S%H935><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall strike <S%H5221><s%> you with a consumption <S%H7829><s%>, and with a fever <S%H6920><s%>, and with an inflammation <S%H1816><s%>, and with an extreme burning <S%H2746><s%>, and with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and with blasting <S%H7711><s%>, and with mildew <S%H3420><s%>; and they shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> you until you perish <S%H6><s%>.
And your heaven <S%H8064><s%> that is over your head <S%H7218><s%> shall be brass <S%H5178><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> that is under you shall be iron <S%H1270><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> powder <S%H80><s%> and dust <S%H6083><s%>: from heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall it come down <S%H3381><s%> upon you <S%H8045><s%>, until you be destroyed.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> you to be struck <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>: you shall go out <S%H3318><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> against them <S%H5127><s%>, and flee seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H2189><s%>: and shall be removed into all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And your carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be food <S%H3978><s%> unto all birds <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and unto the animals <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and no man shall fray them away <S%H2729><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5221><s%> you with the boil <S%H7822><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and with the ulcers <S%H2914><s%>, and with the scab <S%H1618><s%>, and with the itch <S%H2775><s%>, whereof you can <S%H3201><s%> not be healed <S%H7495><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall strike <S%H5221><s%> you with madness <S%H7697><s%>, and blindness <S%H5788><s%>, and astonishment <S%H8541><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>:

And you shall grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%>, as the blind <S%H5787><s%> gropes <S%H4959><s%> in darkness <S%H653><s%>, and you shall not prosper <S%H6743><s%> in your ways <S%H1870><s%>: and you shall be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and spoiled <S%H1497><s%> evermore <S%H3117><s%>, and no man shall save you <S%H3467><s%>.

You shall betroth <S%H781><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with her <S%H1129><s%>: you shall build a house <S%H1004><s%>, and you shall not live <S%H3427><s%> in it <S%H5193><s%>: you shall plant a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, and shall not gather the grapes there <S%H2490><s%>.

Your ox <S%H7794><s%> shall be slain <S%H2873><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> there <S%H2543><s%>: your donkey shall be violently taken away <S%H1497><s%> from before your face <S%H6440><s%>, and shall not be restored <S%H7725><s%> to you <S%H6629><s%>: your sheep shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto your enemies <S%H341><s%>, and you shall have none to rescue them <S%H3467><s%>.

Your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto another <S%H312><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%>, and fail <S%H3616><s%> with longing for them all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H410><s%>: and there shall be no might in your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%>, and all your labors <S%H3018><s%>, shall a nation <S%H5971><s%> which you know <S%H3045><s%> not eat up <S%H398><s%>; and you shall be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>:
So that you shall be mad <S%H7696><s%> for the sight <S%H4758><s%> of your eyes <S%H5869><s%> which you shall see <S%H7200><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall strike <S%H5221><s%> you in the knees <S%H1290><s%>, and in the legs <S%H7785><s%>, with a severe <S%H7451><s%> boil <S%H7822><s%> that cannot <S%H3201><s%> be healed <S%H7495><s%>, from the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> unto the top of your head <S%H6936><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H3212><s%> you <S%H4428><s%>, and your king which you shall set <S%H6965><s%> over you <S%H1471><s%>, unto a nation which neither you nor your fathers <S%H1><s%> have known <S%H3045><s%>; and there shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>.
And you shall become an astonishment <S%H8047><s%>, a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, and a byword <S%H8148><s%>, among all nations <S%H5971><s%> where the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall lead you <S%H5090><s%>.

You shall carry <S%H3318><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> into the field <S%H7704><s%>, and shall gather <S%H622><s%> but little <S%H4592><s%> in <S%H622><s%>; for the locust <S%H697><s%> shall consume it <S%H2628><s%>.

You shall plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, and dress <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H8354><s%>, but shall neither drink of the wine <S%H3196><s%>, nor gather <S%H103><s%> the grapes <S%H8438><s%>; for the worms shall eat them <S%H398><s%>.

You shall have olive trees <S%H2132><s%> throughout all your coasts <S%H1366><s%>, but you shall not anoint <S%H5480><s%> yourself with the oil <S%H8081><s%>; for your olive <S%H2132><s%> shall cast his fruit <S%H5394><s%>.
You shall beget <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>, but you shall not enjoy them <S%H3212><s%>; for they shall go into captivity <S%H7628><s%>.
All your trees <S%H6086><s%> and fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%> shall the locust <S%H6767><s%> consume <S%H3423><s%>.

The stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is inside <S%H7130><s%> you shall get up <S%H5927><s%> above you very <S%H4605><s%> high <S%H4605><s%>; and you shall come down <S%H3381><s%> very <S%H4295><s%> low <S%H4295><s%>.
He shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to you <S%H3867><s%>, and you shall not lend to him <S%H7218><s%>: he shall be the head, and you shall be the tail <S%H2180><s%>.

Moreover all these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon you <S%H7291><s%>, and shall pursue you <S%H5381><s%>, and overtake you <S%H8045><s%>, until you be destroyed; because you listened <S%H8085><s%> not unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which he commanded you <S%H6680><s%>:
And they shall be upon you for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a wonder <S%H4159><s%>, and upon your seed <S%H2233><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Because you serve <S%H5647><s%> not the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with joyfulness <S%H8057><s%>, and with gladness <S%H2898><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>, for the abundance of all things <S%H7230><s%>;

Therefore shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> against you <S%H7458><s%>, in hunger, and in thirst <S%H6772><s%>, and in nakedness <S%H5903><s%>, and in want <S%H2640><s%> of all things <S%H5414><s%>: and he shall put a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> upon your neck <S%H6677><s%>, until he have destroyed you <S%H8045><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against you from far <S%H7350><s%>, from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, as swift as the eagle <S%H5404><s%> flies <S%H1675><s%>; a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose tongue <S%H3956><s%> you shall not understand <S%H8085><s%>;

A nation <S%H1471><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> favor <S%H6440><s%>, which shall not regard <S%H5375><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the old <S%H2205><s%>, nor show favor <S%H2603><s%> to the young <S%H5288><s%>:

And he shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle <S%H929><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%>, until you be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>: which also shall not leave <S%H7604><s%> you either corn <S%H1715><s%>, wine <S%H8492><s%>, or oil <S%H3323><s%>, or the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows <S%H504><s%>, or flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep <S%H6629><s%>, until he have destroyed you <S%H6><s%>.

And he shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> you in all your gates <S%H8179><s%>, until your high <S%H1364><s%> and fenced <S%H1219><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%>, where <S%H2004><s%> you trusted <S%H982><s%>, throughout all your land <S%H776><s%>: and he shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> you in all your gates <S%H8179><s%> throughout all your land <S%H776><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you <S%H5414><s%>.

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your own body <S%H990><s%>, the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> and of your daughters <S%H1323><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H4692><s%>, in the siege, and in the anguish <S%H4689><s%> with which your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress you <S%H6693><s%>:

So that the man <S%H376><s%> that is tender <S%H7390><s%> among you <S%H3966><s%>, and very delicate <S%H6028><s%>, his eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward his brother <S%H251><s%>, and toward the wife <S%H802><s%> of his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and toward the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> which he shall leave <S%H3498><s%>:

So that he will not give <S%H5414><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of them of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> whom he shall eat <S%H398><s%>: because he has nothing left <S%H7604><s%> him in the siege <S%H4692><s%>, and in the anguish <S%H4689><s%>, with which your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> you in all your gates <S%H8179><s%>.

The tender <S%H7390><s%> and delicate <S%H6028><s%> woman among you <S%H5254><s%>, which would not adventure to set <S%H3322><s%> the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot <S%H7272><s%> upon the ground <S%H776><s%> for delicateness <S%H6026><s%> and tenderness <S%H7391><s%>, her eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward the husband <S%H376><s%> of her bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and toward her son <S%H1121><s%>, and toward her daughter <S%H1323><s%>,

And toward her young one <S%H7988><s%> that comes out <S%H3318><s%> from between her feet <S%H7272><s%>, and toward her sons <S%H1121><s%> which she shall carry <S%H3205><s%>: for she shall eat <S%H398><s%> them for want <S%H2640><s%> of all things secretly <S%H5643><s%> in the siege <S%H4692><s%> and anguish <S%H4689><s%>, with which your enemy <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> you in your gates <S%H8179><s%>.

If you will not observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%>, that you may fear <S%H3372><s%> this glorious <S%H3513><s%> and fearful <S%H3372><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, THE LORD <S%H3068><s%> YOUR GOD <S%H430><s%>;

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H6381><s%> your plagues <S%H4347><s%> wonderful <S%H6381><s%>, and the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of your seed <S%H2233><s%>, even great <S%H1419><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%>, and of long continuance <S%H539><s%>, and severe <S%H7451><s%> sicknesses <S%H2483><s%>, and of long continuance <S%H539><s%>.
Moreover he will bring <S%H7725><s%> upon you all the diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which you were afraid <S%H3025><s%> of <S%H6440><s%>; and they shall cling unto you <S%H1692><s%>.

Also every sickness <S%H2483><s%>, and every plague <S%H4347><s%>, which is not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>, them will the Lord <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H5927><s%> upon you <S%H8045><s%>, until you be destroyed.

And you shall be left <S%H7604><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> in number <S%H4962><s%>, whereas <S%H834><s%> you were as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>; because you would not obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3068><s%>, that as the Lord rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over you to do you good <S%H3190><s%>, and to multiply <S%H7235><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>; so the Lord will rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over you to destroy <S%H6><s%> you <S%H8045><s%>, and to bring you to nothing; and you shall be plucked <S%H5255><s%> from off the land <S%H127><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.
